body:
I think we must have a configurable (user) port number (instead of static 1).
There are a lot of rdma devices with 2 ports and we can't assume the first is the one configured.
We can (optionally) get the port number from the user in server creation and expose it here.
@junshi15 - We need it also for the device selection (today it take ibv_devices_list[0]). 
I can do that tomorrow with pleasure, unless you already have something.
